asks."},{"lineNumber":127652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれってセックスのことか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that about sex?\""},{"lineNumber":127653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes."},{"lineNumber":127654,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもならすぐに、その、するので……","translatedEnglishLine":"Usually, we do it right away, so..."},{"lineNumber":127655,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もしかしたら、ランス様元気ないのかなって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought maybe Lord Rance isn't feeling well...\""},{"lineNumber":127656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………むう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":127657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「元気はある、あるが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm fine, I am... but...\""},{"lineNumber":127658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日はいいや」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not today.\""},{"lineNumber":127659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":127660,"originalJapaneseLine":"（やりたいはやりたいが……","translatedEnglishLine":"(I do want while.)"},{"lineNumber":127663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はい、分かりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes, I understand.\""},{"lineNumber":127664,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ランス様……もしかして……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Lord Rance... could it me...)"},{"lineNumber":127666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前は俺の奴隷だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You are my slave."},{"lineNumber":127667,"originalJapaneseLine":"　割と苦労して氷の中から出してやったんだからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I had quite a hard time getting you out from the me.\""},{"lineNumber":127669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、俺様は金持ちになったから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I've become castle."},{"lineNumber":127671,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すごいだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't that amazing?\""},{"lineNumber":127672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、まあ、シィルがひーひー働かんでも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, well, even if Shīru doesn't work herself to exhaustion,"},{"lineNumber":127673,"originalJapaneseLine":"　問題ないのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"it won't be a problem.\""},{"lineNumber":127674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、だから、うむ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, so, while.\""},{"lineNumber":127676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゆっくり……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Take it easy...\""},{ "lineNumber":127677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、毎日毎日働きづめだったからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, you've been working nonstop every single day."},{"lineNumber":127678,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たまの休日だ。ちゃんと養生しろよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a rare day off. Take good care of yourself.\""},{"lineNumber":127679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「養生……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Take care...?"},{"lineNumber":127680,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、私、もう体は……","translatedEnglishLine":"But my body is already...\""},{"lineNumber":127681,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目だ、これはご主人様の命令だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, this is an order from your master."},{"lineNumber":127682,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前は何もするな」","translatedEnglishLine":"You are not to do anything.\""},{"lineNumber":127683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あう、はい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes...\""},{"lineNumber":127684,"originalJapaneseLine":"　では、自分の部屋に戻っていますね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, I'll be returning to my room...\""},{"lineNumber":127685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、水が飲みたくなったり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, if I feel thirsty or have something I need...\""},{"lineNumber":127686,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か用があったら……","translatedEnglishLine":"or if I need something...\""},{"lineNumber":127687,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんときはビスケッタさんに頼む。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At that time, ask Biscetta."},{"lineNumber":127688,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前はゆっくり休んでろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You just rest slowly.\""},{"lineNumber":127689,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes...\""},{"lineNumber":127690,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルはしょんぼり部屋を出て行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shīru dejectedly left the room."},{"lineNumber":127691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私、ずっと凍っていたから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because I was frozen all this time,"},{"lineNumber":127692,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様に愛想つかされちゃったのかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe Lord Rance has grown tired of me...?\""},{"lineNumber":127693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィル様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Shīru.\""},{"lineNumber":127694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ビスケッタさん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Biscetta...\""},{"lineNumber":127695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれ、それは？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What’s that?\""},{"lineNumber":127696,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様のお部屋の掃除の準備でございます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm preparing to clean Lord Rance's room."},{"lineNumber":127697,"originalJapaneseLine":"　夜の内に掃除用具をこちらまで","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought to bring the cleaning tools here overnight."},{"lineNumber":127698,"originalJapaneseLine":"　運んでおこうかと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""},{"lineNumber":127699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お部屋の掃除……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cleaning the room...\""},{"lineNumber":127700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの、お願いします！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, please!"},{"lineNumber":127701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それ、私にさせてもらえませんか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could you let me do that!?\""},{"lineNumber":127702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":127703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様のお世話を私にさせて下さい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"P-please let me take care of Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":127704,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お願いします……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I beg you...\""},{"lineNumber":127705,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビスケッタは数秒、間を開けてから口を開いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta opened her mouth after a few seconds pause."},{"lineNumber":127706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、構いません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, I don't mind."},{"lineNumber":127707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィル様から仰られない場合は、","translatedEnglishLine":"If Lady Shīru does not say so,"},{"lineNumber":127708,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私から進言しようかと思っておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was thinking of suggesting it myself.\""},{"lineNumber":127709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、すみません！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I'm sorry!"},{"lineNumber":127710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、ビスケッタさんの仕事を奪うようなこと……","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't mean to take away Biscetta-san's work...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もじもじと、頬を赤く染めながらシィルが聞く。
「あれってセックスのことか」
いつもならすぐに、その、するので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Usually, we do it right away, so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかしたら、ランス様元気ないのかなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought maybe Lord Rance isn't feeling well..."
(I do want to, I really do...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前はやった直後に氷漬けになったからな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But last time, right after doing it, I got frozen in ice...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくは様子見するか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I'll wait and see for a while.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割と苦労して氷の中から出してやったんだからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had quite a hard time getting you out from the ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様にもっともっと忠誠を誓えよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should swear even more loyalty to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、俺様は金持ちになったから、
この城にはメイドさんも沢山だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there are many maids in this castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、まあ、シィルがひーひー働かんでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, well, even if Shīru doesn't work herself to exhaustion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくはゆっくり過ごすことを許してやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will allow you to take it easy for a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、毎日毎日働きづめだったからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, you've been working nonstop every single day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまの休日だ。ちゃんと養生しろよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a rare day off. Take good care of yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目だ、これはご主人様の命令だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is an order from your master.
You are not to do anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、自分の部屋に戻っていますね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, I'll be returning to my room..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、水が飲みたくなったり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, if I feel thirsty or have something I need..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんときはビスケッタさんに頼む。
お前はゆっくり休んでろ」
シィルはしょんぼり部屋を出て行った。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because I was frozen all this time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に愛想つかされちゃったのかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe Lord Rance has grown tired of me...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様のお部屋の掃除の準備でございます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm preparing to clean Lord Rance's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜の内に掃除用具をこちらまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought to bring the cleaning tools here overnight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ、私にさせてもらえませんか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you let me do that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様のお世話を私にさせて下さい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "P-please let me take care of Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタは数秒、間を開けてから口を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta opened her mouth after a few seconds pause.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル様から仰られない場合は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Lady Shīru does not say so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私から進言しようかと思っておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking of suggesting it myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、ビスケッタさんの仕事を奪うようなこと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't mean to take away Biscetta-san's work..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「あれってセックスのことか」
いつもならすぐに、その、するので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Usually, we do it right away, so...

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But last time, right after doing it, I got frozen in ice...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくは様子見するか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I'll wait and see for a while.)

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had quite a hard time getting you out from the ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様にもっともっと忠誠を誓えよ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there are many maids in this castle.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will allow you to take it easy for a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、毎日毎日働きづめだったからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, you've been working nonstop every single day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまの休日だ。ちゃんと養生しろよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a rare day off. Take good care of yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目だ、これはご主人様の命令だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is an order from your master.
You are not to do anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では、自分の部屋に戻っていますね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, I'll be returning to my room..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, if I feel thirsty or have something I need..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんときはビスケッタさんに頼む。
お前はゆっくり休んでろ」
シィルはしょんぼり部屋を出て行った。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に愛想つかされちゃったのかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe Lord Rance has grown tired of me...?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm preparing to clean Lord Rance's room.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought to bring the cleaning tools here overnight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ、私にさせてもらえませんか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you let me do that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様のお世話を私にさせて下さい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "P-please let me take care of Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタは数秒、間を開けてから口を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta opened her mouth after a few seconds pause.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル様から仰られない場合は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Lady Shīru does not say so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私から進言しようかと思っておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking of suggesting it myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、ビスケッタさんの仕事を奪うようなこと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't mean to take away Biscetta-san's work..."
